title: How to Create an Aluminum Foil Funnel

steps.title: Create a model funnel using paper or soft cardboard that you can use as a mold.
steps.content: Create a model funnel using paper or soft cardboard that you can use as a mold. A file, flimsy, folder or piece of card will all be suitable.

steps.title: Wrap the paper in a funnel shape.
steps.content: Wrap the paper in a funnel shape. Check to see if it fits in the container(s) you intend to use.

steps.title: Tape the model funnel together to hold it firmly.
steps.content: Tape the model funnel together to hold it firmly. You now have a funnel model ready for wrapping the aluminum foil around.

steps.title: Tear off a sheet of aluminum foil, slightly longer than the funnel model.
steps.content: Tear off a sheet of aluminum foil, slightly longer than the funnel model. You want a slightly longer sheet in case you need to adjust the size. Use only new foil for making the foil funnel. While you may want to repurpose the foil used to wrap last night’s meal, it will be weaker and may rip or tear.

steps.title: Wrap the foil around the model.
steps.content: Wrap the foil around the model. Lightly tape one end of the foil to the funnel model. Wrap the foil around the model to create the foil funnel.

steps.title: Tape the other end of the foil together to complete the funnel.
steps.content: Tape the other end of the foil together to complete the funnel. You may want to line the entire edge with tape to ensure it fully adheres.

steps.title: Remove the tape from the inside of the aluminum foil funnel to release it from the cardboard model.
steps.content: Remove the tape from the inside of the aluminum foil funnel to release it from the cardboard model. You will be left with a perfectly formed aluminum foil funnel.

steps.title: Use funnel immediately.
steps.content: Use funnel immediately. This funnel can be easily crushed or changed so it’s best to put it to use right away. Place a paper towel underneath the receptacle to avoid dripping (in case the funnel fails or liquid drips). Also place a paper towel underneath the funnel after removing it from the bottle. Push the funnel deeply into the bottle when transferring liquid to reduce the possibility of spillage.
